name: Manual
description: Driver manually changes gears using a clutch and gear stick.

name: Automatic
description: Automatically changes gears based on speed and load without driver input.

name: Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT)
description: Uses a belt and pulley system to provide seamless gear ratio changes.

name: Dual Clutch Transmission (DCT)
description: Uses two separate clutches for odd and even gear sets for faster shifting.

name: Semi-Automatic
description: Combines manual gear selection with automated clutch operation.

name: Tiptronic
description: Type of automatic transmission that allows manual gear selection.
